answerText: hydrochloric acid[10] This process, which produces soda ash, replaced the Leblanc process because it lacked hydrochloric acid as a byproduct.
heading: NASAT |2014 | 3 | 7 | Science | Chemistry | College
subject: Science
question: Question: A solution of this compound and nitric acid can dissolve gold, a solution known as aqua regia. [10] Name this diatomic acid, the primary constituent of gastric acid in the stomach.
